runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass " & ''.\visualstudio.ps1'' -Edition ', parameters('Edition'), ' -Version ', parameters('Version'), ' -Channel ', parameters('Channel'), ' -Workloads ''' , parameters('Workloads')  , ''' -WorkloadList ''' , parameters('WorkloadList')  , ''' -Languages ''' , parameters('Languages')  , '''  -Key ''', parameters('Key'), ''' -Components ''', parameters('Components'), '''  -Restart ''',  parameters('Restart')  , '''  "' )]
